name: Apparix Backup
description: Lightweight backup solution for your Apparix store. Backs up database, code, and settings without impacting server performance.
author: Apparix

settings.label: Backup Retention
settings.description: Number of backups to keep (older backups are automatically deleted)

settings.label: Include Database
settings.description: Backup all database tables and data

settings.label: Include Code Files
settings.description: Backup PHP, JS, CSS files (excludes images and uploads)

settings.label: Include Configuration
settings.description: Backup settings, themes, and plugin configurations

settings.label: Enable Scheduled Backups
settings.description: Automatically create backups on a schedule (requires cron job)

settings.label: Backup Schedule
settings.description: How often to create automatic backups

features: Database backup with streaming export (low memory usage)
One-click manual backup from admin panel
Excludes images and large files to save space
